General.Name: Shenzhen Baoming Technology Co
General.Description: Shenzhen Baoming Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LED backlight modules and capacitive touch screens of small and medium size flat panel display devices in China. Its LED backlight modules are used in mobile phones, as well as other small and medium size displays, such as GPS and digital cameras; and capacitive touch screens are used in mobile phones and tablet PCs. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
